LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PowerConsumptionDiagnosis_De: The amount of power this MedPod will draw from the power grid while operating in Diagnosis mode.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PowerConsumptionHealing_Desc: The amount of power this MedPod will draw from the power grid while operating in Treatment mode.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_DiagnosisTime_Desc: How long it takes for this MedPod to diagnose a patient.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PerHediffHealingTime_Desc: How long it takes (on average) for this MedPod to treat each medical condition on a patient.\n\nNote that this is scaled according to the severity of the condition - for instance, less severe injuries will take less time to treat.
LanguageData.MedPod_Message_CannotRescue_NoMedPod: No reachable, un-reserved {0} MedPod with power in safe temperature.
LanguageData.MedPod_Message_CannotRescue_NoVetPod: No reachable, un-reserved VetPod with power in safe temperature.
LanguageData.MedPod_FloatMenu_PatientWithHediffNotAll: MedPod cannot treat patients with {0} hediff
LanguageData.MedPod_FloatMenu_PatientWithTraitNotAllo: MedPod cannot treat patients with {0} trait
LanguageData.MedPod_FloatMenu_MedicalCareCategoryTooL: Patient care quality must be Industrial medicine or above
LanguageData.MedPod_CommandGizmoAllowGuests_Desc: Allow this {0} to be used by guests and other non-colony visitors.
LanguageData.MedPod_CommandGizmoAbortTreatment_Desc: Stop treating the current patient immediately.
LanguageData.MedPod_Letter_TraitRemoved_Desc: {PAWN_labelShort} has had the following trait(s) removed via MedPod treatment:\n
